org.bluez
Interface BlueZAPI

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlueZAPIV3, BlueZAPIV4
public interface BlueZAPI

Abstraction interface to access BlueZ over D-Bus. Only methods required for BlueCove JSR-82 implementation are declared.

Nested Class Summary
static interface BlueZAPI.DeviceInquiryListener
          Receive device discovery events.
